original_text: After each party, Job would ask his children to come and visit him. He wanted to make them clean again if they were guilty of bad things. He thought, ‘Perhaps they have done something that is bad. Perhaps they have thought bad things against God.’ So he would get up early in the morning. He would offer a burnt offering as a sacrifice for each of his children. Job always did this after each party that his children had.
korean_text: 그들이 차례대로 잔치를 끝내면 욥이 그들을 불러다가 성결하게 하되 아침에 일어나서 그들의 명수대로 번제를 드렸으니 이는 욥이 말하기를 혹시 내 아들들이 죄를 범하여 마음으로 하나님을 욕되게 하였을까 함이라 욥의 행위가 항상 이러하였더라

sentences.original_text: He wanted to make them clean again
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들을 다시 깨끗하게 만들고 싶었다

sentences.original_text: if they were guilty of bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 나쁜 일에 대해 죄가 있다면

sentences.original_text: 'Perhaps they have done something that is bad'
Perhaps they have thought bad things against God
sentences.korean_translation: 아마 그들은 하나님께 대하여 나쁜 생각을 했을 것이다'

sentences.original_text: So he would get up early in the morning
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 이른 아침에 일어났을 것이다

sentences.original_text: He would offer a burnt offering as a sacrifice
after each party that his children had
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 자녀들이 가진 각 파티 후에
